Operation 'getFeedConnections' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_output_details. Original summary is vague about what 'search' means. Description lacks specificity about what parameters filter the results and what the response contains. Added clarity about pagination, return object type, and domain context about financial institution connections.

data.current_description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can search for available feed connections in the system.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve feed connections with optional filtering
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of feed connections established between Xero and financial institutions. Supports filtering via query parameters to narrow results. Returns a paginated collection of FeedConnection objects containing connection details, status, and configuration information.
data.reasoning: Original summary is vague about what 'search' means. Description lacks specificity about what parameters filter the results and what the response contains. Added clarity about pagination, return object type, and domain context about financial institution connections.

message: Operation 'createFeedConnections' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary has grammatical issue ('connection' should be plural). Description lacks information about what the response contains, the asynchronous nature (202 status), and the side effect that connections become immediately usable. Added clarity on these points for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_summary: Create one or more new feed connection
data.current_description: By passing in the FeedConnections array object in the body, you can create one or more new feed connections
data.description_suggestion: Creates one or more new feed connections between Xero and financial institutions. Accepts a FeedConnections array in the request body containing connection configuration details. Returns HTTP 202 Accepted with connection identifiers. Newly created connections are immediately available for bank feed operations.
data.reasoning: Summary has grammatical issue ('connection' should be plural). Description lacks information about what the response contains, the asynchronous nature (202 status), and the side effect that connections become immediately usable. Added clarity on these points for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'getFeedConnection' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description has unclear phrasing ('FeedConnection Id options') and doesn't specify what the response contains. Improved description clarifies the singular nature of the response and provides context for when to use this operation.

data.current_summary: Retrieve single feed connection based on a unique id provided
data.current_description: By passing in a FeedConnection Id options, you can search for matching feed connections
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a single feed connection by its unique identifier. Returns the complete FeedConnection object including connection status, configuration details, and associated metadata. Use this operation to verify connection details or retrieve current connection state.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description has unclear phrasing ('FeedConnection Id options') and doesn't specify what the response contains. Improved description clarifies the singular nature of the response and provides context for when to use this operation.

message: Operation 'deleteFeedConnections' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary doesn't indicate multiple connections can be deleted. Description lacks information about the asynchronous response (202), side effects (no more feed updates), and what happens to pending data. Enhanced to clarify these critical operational details for AI agents.

data.current_description: By passing in FeedConnections array object in the body, you can delete a feed connection.
data.summary_suggestion: Delete one or more feed connections
data.description_suggestion: Deletes one or more existing feed connections by submitting a FeedConnections array in the request body. Returns HTTP 202 Accepted. Deleted connections will no longer receive bank feed updates and any pending transactions will not be processed. This operation is asynchronous.
data.reasoning: Summary doesn't indicate multiple connections can be deleted. Description lacks information about the asynchronous response (202), side effects (no more feed updates), and what happens to pending data. Enhanced to clarify these critical operational details for AI agents.

message: Operation 'getStatements' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is clear. Description is too vague about which parameters are available and what the response structure contains. Added specificity about common filter options, pagination support, and the structure of returned Statement objects to improve AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: By passing in parameters, you can search for matching statements
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves bank statements with optional filtering and pagination. Supports filtering by feed connection ID, date range, and other criteria via query parameters. Returns a paginated collection of Statement objects containing transaction lines, opening/closing balances, and statement metadata. Use pagination parameters to control result set size.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear. Description is too vague about which parameters are available and what the response structure contains. Added specificity about common filter options, pagination support, and the structure of returned Statement objects to improve AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'createStatements' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is adequate but description is completely missing. Added comprehensive description explaining the request format, response behavior (202 status), and side effects (asynchronous processing, transaction availability). This is critical for AI agents to understand the operation's purpose and effects.

data.current_summary: Creates one or more new statements
data.description_suggestion: Creates one or more new bank statements for a feed connection. Accepts a Statements array in the request body containing statement details including transaction lines, opening/closing balances, and currency information. Returns HTTP 202 Accepted with statement identifiers. Statements are validated and processed asynchronously; transactions are made available to Xero users upon successful processing.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate but description is completely missing. Added comprehensive description explaining the request format, response behavior (202 status), and side effects (asynchronous processing, transaction availability). This is critical for AI agents to understand the operation's purpose and effects.

message: Operation 'getStatement' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description incorrectly uses 'search for matching statements' (plural) when operation retrieves a single statement. Added clarity about the singular response and detailed information about what Statement object properties are returned, using domain terminology from the API schema context.

data.current_summary: Retrieve single statement based on unique id provided
data.current_description: By passing in a statement id, you can search for matching statements
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a single bank statement by its unique identifier. Returns the complete Statement object including all transaction lines (StatementLines), opening balance (StartBalance), closing balance (EndBalance), currency, and statement period information. Use this operation to retrieve detailed transaction data for a specific statement.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description incorrectly uses 'search for matching statements' (plural) when operation retrieves a single statement. Added clarity about the singular response and detailed information about what Statement object properties are returned, using domain terminology from the API schema context.
